synopsis.text: Katagiri, an 18-year-old who has faced life's challenges head-on, finds himself back in the world of academia after a long hiatus spent working in a factory to support his younger sister. With his sister failing her high school entrance exams, they both find themselves enrolled in the same correspondence high school, marking a new chapter in their lives. On his first day, Katagiri crosses paths with Rio Aizawa, a girl from a privileged background who he believes has never experienced hard work. This encounter sparks an intriguing dynamic between the two, hinting at a possible romantic entanglement or a brewing rivalry. Join Katagiri as he navigates through high school, balancing his responsibilities and exploring new relationships.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
